art.author: james_t_guthridge
art.post:
We of so little fate.
God said unto thee
I love thee, I love but thee
with a love that shall not die
Till the moon turns old
Till the stars turn cold
Till the leaves in the judgement
book unfold.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud

art.author: james_t_guthridge
art.post: Their is no f in my last name, I doubled the keys, Last name Guthridge
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
